title: Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons        The Visitor Center at Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument NPS Photo      The Alibates Visitor Center is open seven days a week, 9:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.The visitor center offers a variety of activities for the whole family, including:Museum exhibitsRanger-guided quarry tours11-minute film about Alibates Flint Quarries National MonumentFlintknapping demonstrationsTeaching garden with native plants Please check the current program schedule. Call 806-857-3151 (weekdays) or 806-857-6680 (weekends) for Quarry Tour reservations. The Alibates Visitor Center is closed on New Year's Day, Thanksgiving Day, and Christmas Day.       Local school children tour Alibates. NPS Photo
